settings.title: The ProLon® Diet
settings.description:
The practice of fasting comes with both its rewards and challenges. For some, the thought of going without food for an extended period of time (2 or more days) can be daunting.

However, to get the maximum health benefits a fast has to offer, a prolonged fast like the ProLon® Diet is required.

settings.title: Developed by Professor Valter Longo
settings.description: Developed by Prof. Valter Longo, Director of the Longevity Institute at the University of Southern California, The ProLon Diet is the first and only clinically tested, scientific breakthrough in Fasting Mimicking technology that goes well beyond weight loss* when it comes to beneficial health effects. The 5 days of The ProLon Fasting Mimicking Diet puts the body into a fasting state that triggers the body’s own mechanism’s to recycle at the cellular level for rejuvenation from within.

settings.title: ProLon Diet Benefits
settings.description:
• Reduction of hard to lose, visceral belly fat while maintaining lean body mass

• Help to maintain a healthy metabolic balance

• The ability to EAT REAL FOOD throughout the 5-day fast

• Convenience of everything you need for your 5-day fast, no extra trips out or shopping needed!

• Cellular Rejuvenation

settings.title: ProLon - The 5 Day Fast YOU can achieve.
settings.description:
With the ProLon Diet, you’ll experience these health benefits and more while providing your body with a scientifically developed combination of micro and macronutrients designed to keep the body nourished while going through the rejuvenating process of the fasting state.
ORDER NOW
